body_html:
If there's anything I can do to help searching for the culprit (enabling some debug switches, using other (combinations of) versions), let me know. The hardware I tried it is a Lenovo P50 with a Nvidia Quadro M2000M and also, there is an Intel GPU P530. lscpi says:

...
00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation HD Graphics P530 (rev 06)
...
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: NVIDIA Corporation GM107GLM [Quadro M2000M](rev a2)
...

Maybe this is a "multiple GPU on different PCI busses" situation. I had expected the Intel GPU would have been ignored.

Maybe this is a "multiple GPU on different PCI busses" situation. I had expected the Intel GPU would have been ignored.
